title: PlayerAPI MCPC+
author: dhji
txt_content:
求大神分享PlayerAPI 1.6.2 for MCPC+
急求QAQ
[groupid=421]【Dawnwork】[/groupid]

replies.author: dhji
replies.txt_content:
墨小八 发表于 2015-2-9 16:06
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1sjnwU3z
望楼主采纳
是直接拖入mod文件夹？

replies.author: 墨小八
replies.txt_content:
Player API Forge 1.1 ：安装了Forge后将压缩包文件放入.minecraft\mod文件夹即可。
也可以参考文件夹中的Readme说明文档。
楼组看一下

replies.txt_content:
